Name: 1000 Man General
About the game: To battle! An enormous battle awaits you on the way to glory. Tasked with leading 1000 troops, you must devise a battle plan that will ensure your army emerges victorious. Purchase troops, assign locations, and give them orders on the battle map to create devastating maneuvers to annihilate the opposing army. Lead your troops into battle. Give the order to charge, and join them in the assault. Hack and slash your way through hundreds of enemy troops seeking to destroy your army. Replay any level you have already beaten with the ability to customize the weather, enemy difficulty, or even scale up the number of troops to an insane level.
